text:
UNIVERSITY OF PITTSBURGH
SCHOOL OF EDUCATION
Dr. William G. Harley
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D. C.
Dear Bill:
I would be delighted to serve on the R^plutions
I shall await word from Harry as to how we should go about being
resolute.
I am off in a couple of days for Abidjan. Will be back on
April 1. Anything I can do for you in Africa? If so, write to
me in care of UNESCO African Ministers of Education Conference,
Abidjan.
Best regards.
Sincerely,
Seth Spaulding
Coordinator
International Education Programs
eg
